DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety, efficacy and calcium metabolism of up to 8 weeks of treatment with calcitriol 3 mcg/g ointment versus its vehicle, when used twice daily, without occlusion, to treat children aged 2 to 12 years, with plaque psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: Plaque Psoriasis Study in Pediatric Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male or female 2 to 12 years of age Clinical diagnosis of stable mild to moderate plaque psoriasis Other forms of psoriasis Hypercalcemia Past history of kidney stones Vitamin D deficiency Other concomitant dermatological disease
